flowcharts.description: This flowchart illustrates the hierarchical structure of the application, showing the main components and their relationships.
This flowchart visualizes the flow of data within the application, showing how data is generated, processed, and passed between different components.
This flowchart focuses on the interaction between the different services in the application, outlining the steps involved in connecting to the respective services and passing data.
This flowchart depicts the user interface (UI) interactions in the application, illustrating the different screens, input boxes, and buttons.
This flowchart outlines the testing process for the application, including the different test cases and their dependencies.
This flowchart focuses on the utility functions in the application, illustrating the different utility functions and their relationships.

sequence_diagrams.description: Shows the sequence of interactions between the user interface (UI) and the application components.
Illustrates the flow of data generation and processing, including steps like retrieving data, applying data algorithms, and generating outputs.
Depicts the interaction between the application services and external APIs or libraries.
Shows how the application loads and processes configuration settings.
Illustrates the sequence of steps involved in executing tests.
Depicts the flow of logging activities within the application.
Shows the sequence of steps involved in file handling operations.
